title: Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     May 10, 2016  National Park Service Seeks Comments on Invasive Plant Management Plan for National Capital Region Parks  The National Park Service (NPS) is accepting public comments on an Invasive Plant Management Plan and Environmental Assessment (plan/EA) for 15 national parks in the greater Washington D.C. region through June 9, 2016. Comments are accepted online or by mail.   March 17, 2016  Step Behind-the-Scenes of the Filene Center at Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts  Join us for a rare backstage tour and see where your favorite performers prepare for the stage! Ranger-led tours of the Filene Center at Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts offer a sneak-peek at artist dressing rooms, rehearsal spaces, and the headliner performersâ€™ room, known as the green room.
